data.yml:
openapi: 3.0.0
info: 
    title: Google Translate API 
    version: 1.0.0 
paths:
    /translate:
        post:
            summary: Translates input text from one language to another.
            requestBody:
                description: A JSON object containing the text to be translated and target language.
                required: true
                content:
                    application/json:
                        schema:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                                text:
                                    type: string
                                    example: "your text here"
                                target_language:
                                    type: string
                                    example: "en"
            responses:
                '200':
                    description: A successful response
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                type: object
                                properties:
                                    translated_text:
                                        type: string
                                        example: "translated text here."

data.yml:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Google Translate API
  version: "1.0"

paths:
  /translate:
    get:
      summary: Translate Text
      operationId: translate
      parameters:
        - in: query
          name: text
          schema: 
            type: string
          description: The text to be translated
          required: true
        - in: query
          name: target
          schema: 
            type: string
          description: The target language
          required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Translation result
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: 
                type: object
                properties: 
                  originalText:
                    type: string
                    description: The original text
                  translatedText:
                    type: string
                    description: The translated text
              example:
                originalText: "Original text"
                translatedText: "Translated text"

data.yml:
apiVersion: "1.0"
basePath: /api
paths:
  /users:
    get:
      description: Returns a list of users
      parameters:
        - name: limit
          description: How many items to return at one time 
          required: false
          type: integer
          format: int32
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successfully retrieved list 
          schema:
            $ref: "#/definitions/UserListModel"

data.yml:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Google Translate 
  version: 1.0.0

servers:
  - url: https://translate.google.com

paths:
  /translate:
    get:
      summary: Translate Text
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successfully translated
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  translatedText:
                    type: string
                  originalText:
                    type: string
                example:
                  translatedText: 'texto traducido'
                  originalText: 'translated text'
    post:
      summary: Rate this Translation
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                rating:
                  type: integer
                  minimum: 0
                  maximum: 5
                feedback:
                  type: string
            example:
              rating: 4
              feedback: 'The translation was accurate'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successfully submitted the rating and feedback
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
                example:
                  message: 'Your feedback will be used to help improve Google Translate'

data.yml:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Google Translate API
  version: 1.0.0
  description: API designed to wrap Google Translate frontend functionalities.
servers:
  - url: https://translate.google.com
paths:
  /:
    get:
      summary: Translate text
      operationId: translate
      parameters:
        - name: text
          description: Original text to translate
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "Original text"
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  text:
                    type: string
                    description: Translated text
                    example: "Translated text"
  /feedback:
    post:
      summary: Submit translation feedback
      operationId: submitFeedback
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                feedback:
                  type: string
                  description: User feedback
                  example: "This is my feedback"
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
                    description: Response message
                    example: "Your feedback will be used to help improve Google Translate"

data.yml:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Google Translate API
  version: "1.0"
paths:
  /translate:
    get:
      summary: Translated text
      description: Translate a given text into a different language.
      parameters:
        - name: text
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          description: Text to be translated
        - name: language
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          description: Language into which the text is to be translated
      responses:
        200:
          description: A translated text response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  translatedText:
                    type: string
                    example: Translation result
  /feedback:
    post:
      summary: Feedback for the translation
      description: Submit feedback to improve the translation system.
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                feedback:
                  type: string
                  example: Feedback text
      responses:
        200:
          description: Feedback submission response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
                    example: Feedback received successfully

data.yml:
openapi: "3.0.0"
info:
  title: Google Translate API
  description: API for Google Translate Services.
  version: "1.0.0"

paths:
  /translate:
    get:
      summary: Translate text
      parameters:
        - name: text
          in: query
          description: Text to be translated.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: targetLang
          in: query
          description: Target language for translation.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string            
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful translation.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  translatedText:
                    type: string
              examples:
                translated:
                  value: 
                    translatedText: "Translated text"
        '400':
          description: Invalid parameters provided.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  error:
                    type: string
              examples:
                error:
                  value:
                    error: "Invalid parameters provided"
        '500':
          description: Error occurred during translation.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  error:
                    type: string
              examples:
                error:
                  value:
                    error: "Error occurred during translation"

paths:
  /translate:

      summary: Translate text
      parameters:
        - name: text
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string

        - name: targetLanguage

data.yml:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Google Translate API
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  /translate:
    post:
      summary: Translate text
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                text:
                  type: string
                targetLanguage:
                  type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful Operation
          content:
            application/json:
             schema: 
               type: object
               properties:
                 translatedText:
                   type: string

data.yml:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: "1.0.0"
  title: Translation API
  description: "This is an API for Google Translate, an online tool for translating text"
paths:
  /translate:
    get:
      summary: Translates text to another language
      description: "This endpoint is responsible for translating one language to another."
      parameters:
        - name: original_text
          in: query
          description: "Text to be translated"
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "Original text"
        - name: translate_to
          in: query
          description: "Desired language for translation"
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "Spanish"
      responses:
        200:
          description: Translation successful
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  translated_text:
                    type: string
                    example: "Texto original"
        400:
          description: Bad request error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  error_message:
                    type: string
                    example: "Bad request"
  /feedback:
    post:
      summary: Receives user feedback on translations
      description: "This endpoint is responsible for receiving user feedback on translations."
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
           schema:
             type: object
             properties:
               feedback:
                 type: string
                 example: "Helpful translation"
      responses:
        200:
          description: Feedback received
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
                    example: "Thank you for your feedback!"
        400:
          description: Bad request error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  error_message:
                    type: string
                    example: "Bad request"

#### Chia sẻ cookie

Trang web này sử dụng cookie để cung cấp cho bạn trải nghiệm duyệt web tốt hơn. Tìm hiểu thêm về cách [chúng tôi sử dụng cookie và cách bạn có thể thay đổi cài đặt của mình](https://zalo.vn/dieukhoan).

data.yml:
swagger: '2.0'
info:
  title: API Title
  version: '1.0'
host: 'localhost:8080'
basePath: '/api'
schemes:
  - http
paths:
  /users:
    get:
      summary: Return all users
      responses:
        '200':
          description: A list of users
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/definitions/User'
definitions:
  User:
    type: object
    properties:
      id:
        type: integer
      name:
        type: string
